creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
signed: verso TR; black pigment:  L. PETERSON / 2022
text: Flat, green painted background with a central scene depicting a figure laying on his right side with his elbow bent, hand holding head. Surrounded by flowers in front and behind him. The Black man is wearing a white shirt and pants. He is smiling and gazing directly at the viewer.
title: The Late Spring Arrival
